SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT507
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by the Receiver of a collateral claim, a collateral proposal or a proposal/request for collateral substitution.
It is used to advise the status of the received message.
It may also be used to:
a) reject a collateral claim, collateral proposal or the proposal/request of a collateral substitution
b) accept a collateral claim, collateral proposal or the proposal/request of a collateral substitution
c) advise the settlement details of proposed collateral
d) reply to a cancellation request previously sent by the Receiver
e) re-send a message previously sent (Subfunction of the message is DUPL)
f) provide a third party with a copy of the message for information (Subfunction of the message is COPY)
g) re-send to a third party a copy of the message for information (Subfunction of the message is CODU)

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86) :

Code.Name: CAST
Code.Description: Message reporting on a cancellation request status.

Code.Name: INST
Code.Description: Message reporting on an instruction status.

Validation.Comment: Subfunction, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85) :

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: AFBA
Code.Description: French Banker's Association Agreement.

Code.Name: BBAA
Code.Description: British Banker's Association Agreement.

Code.Name: DERV
Code.Description: German Rahmenvertrag Agreement.

Code.Name: ISDA
Code.Description: International Swaps and Derivatives Association Agreement.

Code.Name: NONR
Code.Description: No information about the master agreement is available.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
If Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BFWD
Code.Description: Any securities traded out beyond 3 days which include treasury notes, JGBs and Gilts.

Code.Name: CBCO
Code.Description: Exposures related to activity with central banks.

Code.Name: CCIR
Code.Description: Cross Currency Interest Rate Swap, indicating the exchange of fixed interest payments in one currency for those in another

Code.Name: COMM
Code.Description: Commodities trades eg futures and options on gold, silver, wheat.

Code.Name: CRDS
Code.Description: Trading of credit default swap.

Code.Name: CRPR
Code.Description: Combination of various types of trades.

Code.Name: CRSP
Code.Description: Cash lending/borrowing; letter of Credit; signing of master agreement.

Code.Name: CRTL
Code.Description: Opening of a credit line before trading.

Code.Name: EQPT
Code.Description: Trading of equity option (Also known as stock options).

Code.Name: EQUS
Code.Description: Equity swap trades where the return of an equity is exchanged for either a fixed or a floating rate of interest.

Code.Name: EXPT
Code.Description: Trading of exotic option eg. a non-standard option.

Code.Name: EXTD
Code.Description: Trading of exchanged traded derivatives in general (Opposite to Over the Counter (OTC)) .

Code.Name: FIXI
Code.Description: Trading of fixed income instruments.

Code.Name: FORW
Code.Description: FX trades with a value date in the future

Code.Name: FORX
Code.Description: FX trades in general.

Code.Name: FUTR
Code.Description: Related to futures trading activity.

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: In support of settlement via an RTGS or other clearing system.

Code.Name: OPTN
Code.Description: Trading of option on Foreign Exchange.

Code.Name: OTCD
Code.Description: Over-the-counter (OTC) Derivatives in general eg. contracts which are traded and privately negotiated.

Code.Name: PAYM
Code.Description: In support of any type of cash settlement.

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: In support of a repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: RVPO
Code.Description: In support of a reverse repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: SBSB
Code.Description: Securities buy sell back.

Code.Name: SCIE
Code.Description: Exotic single currency interest rate swap.

Code.Name: SCIR
Code.Description: Single Currency Interest Rate Swap.

Code.Name: SCRP
Code.Description: Combination of securities related exposure types.

Code.Name: SHSL
Code.Description: Short sale exposure.

Code.Name: SLEB
Code.Description: Securities lending and borrowing.

Code.Name: SLOA
Code.Description: Secured loan.

Code.Name: SWPT
Code.Description: Option on interest rate swap.

Code.Name: TBAS
Code.Description: To be announced (TBA) related collateral.

Code.Name: TCRP
Code.Description: Combination of treasury related exposure types.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .
If Data Source Scheme is not present, and Qualifier is CPRC, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Cancellation has been completed.

Code.Name: CANP
Code.Description: Cancellation is pending. It is not known at this time whether cancellation can be affected.

Code.Name: DEND
Code.Description: Cancellation will not be executed.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been acknowledged for further processing by the account servicer.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Cancellation has been rejected for further processing.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, and Qualifier is IPRC, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Instruction has been acknowledged by the account servicer.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Instruction has been rejected for further processing.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, and Qualifier is REST, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: ACCP
Code.Description: A part of the collateral is accepted, a part rejected.

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: The claim, substitution, proposal is fully accepted.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: The claim, substitution, proposal is fully rejected.

Code.Name: SUBR
Code.Description: Party A agrees with the return part of the substitution and accepts to wait for the proposal of the new collateral.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, and Qualifier is CAND, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: CANI
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled as per your request.

Code.Name: CANS
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the system.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, and Qualifier is DEND, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: DCAN
Code.Description: Cancellation request was denied since the instruction has already been cancelled.

Code.Name: DPRG
Code.Description: Cancellation request was denied because the instruction execution is in progress.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, and Qualifier is REJT, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: CONL
Code.Description: Concentration limit was exceeded.

Code.Name: CPTY
Code.Description: Deal or exposure is unknown.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Party A does not agree with the call amount.

Code.Name: DISE
Code.Description: Party A does not agree with the exposure amount.

Code.Name: ICOL
Code.Description: Insufficient collateral proposed.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: ULNK
Code.Description: Linked reference is unknown.

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
If format option is A, Number Id must contain the following code (Error code(s): K13) :

Code.Description: Message is a linked to a received claim.
Message is a linked to a received proposal.
Message is a linked to a received substitution request.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BCOL
Code.Description: Either a Bank Guarantee or Letter of Credit.

Code.Name: CCOL
Code.Description: Collateral is cash.

Code.Name: SCOL
Code.Description: Collateral is securities.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: Collateral specified is accepted.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Collateral specified is rejected.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: CONL
Code.Description: Concentration limit was exceeded with it.

Code.Name: INEL
Code.Description: Ineligible piece of collateral.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: WBKG
Code.Description: Wrong bank is quoted on the bank guarantee or documentary credit.

Code.Name: WSET
Code.Description: Settlement parties are incorrect.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is BENE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NBEN
Code.Description: No Change of Beneficial Ownership (NCBO). If a standing instruction is in place for change of beneficial ownership (CBO), then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YBEN
Code.Description: Change of Beneficial Ownership (CBO). If a standing instruction is in place for no change of beneficial ownership (NCBO), then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is CASY and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ABEC
Code.Description: Settle money through EBA EURO Clearing (EBA).

Code.Name: ARTI
Code.Description: Settle money through ARTIS (AT).

Code.Name: AUCL
Code.Description: Settle money through Payment Delivery System/RITF-RTGS (AU).

Code.Name: AVPS
Code.Description: Settle money through AVP (NZ).

Code.Name: BELS
Code.Description: Settle money through ELLIPS (BE).

Code.Name: BOFI
Code.Description: Settle money through BOF (FI).

Code.Name: BOJS
Code.Description: Settle money through Bank of Japan System.

Code.Name: BRLI
Code.Description: Settle money through BIREL (IT).

Code.Name: CHEC
Code.Description: Settle money through Cheque.

Code.Name: DELS
Code.Description: Settle money through EUROLINK SYSTEM (DE).

Code.Name: DKCS
Code.Description: Settle money through DEBES (DK).

Code.Name: EAFD
Code.Description: Settle money through EAF - EURO ACCESS FRANKFURT (DE).

Code.Name: EBAC
Code.Description: Settle money through EBA EURO Clearing (Members).

Code.Name: EPMS
Code.Description: Settle money through EPM - ECB Payment Mechanism.

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: Settle money through UK Domestic Sort Code.

Code.Name: GROS
Code.Description: Settle money through gross settlement system.

Code.Name: HERM
Code.Description: Settle money through HERMES EURO (GR).

Code.Name: HSVP
Code.Description: Settle money through HSVP (HR).

Code.Name: IRIS
Code.Description: Settle money through IRIS (IE).

Code.Name: LIPS
Code.Description: Settle money through LIPS GROSS (LU).

Code.Name: LVTS
Code.Description: Settle money through LVTS (CA).

Code.Name: NETS
Code.Description: Settle money through net settlement system.

Code.Name: NICS
Code.Description: Settle money through NICS (NO).

Code.Name: PCHS
Code.Description: Settle money through Payment System Switzerland (CH).

Code.Name: PEGE
Code.Description: Settle money through Payment System in Egypt (EG).

Code.Name: PNSF
Code.Description: Settle money through PNS (FR).

Code.Name: PVEV
Code.Description: Settle money through PVE (VE).

Code.Name: RIXS
Code.Description: Settle money through RIX (SE).

Code.Name: SAMO
Code.Description: Settle money through SAMOS (ZA).

Code.Name: SEPI
Code.Description: Settle money through SEPI (ES).

Code.Name: SITS
Code.Description: Settle money through SIT (SI).

Code.Name: SLBE
Code.Description: Settle money through SLBE (ES).

Code.Name: SPGT
Code.Description: Settle money through SPGT (PT).

Code.Name: TARG
Code.Description: Settle money through TARGET.

Code.Name: TBFF
Code.Description: Settle money through TBF - Transferts Banque De France (FR).

Code.Name: TOPN
Code.Description: Settle money through TOP (NL).

Code.Name: USCH
Code.Description: Settle money through CHIPS (US).

Code.Name: USFW
Code.Description: Settle money through Fedwire (US).

Code.Name: VIBE
Code.Description: Settle money through VIBER (HU).

Code.Name: ZENG
Code.Description: Settle money through Zengin.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is REGT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NREG
Code.Description: Hold the securities in street name. If there is a standing instruction in place to register on receipt, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YREG
Code.Description: Register on receipt. If there is a standing instruction in place to hold the securities in street name, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is RTGS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the non-RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the RTGS instruction, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the non-RTGS system, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is SCOL, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: DVDS
Code.Description: Delivery against delivery.

Code.Name: DVPT
Code.Description: Delivery against payment.

Code.Name: FOPT
Code.Description: Delivery free of payment.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is STCO and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ASGN
Code.Description: Transfer of ownership of the asset to another party during the closing of an option.

Code.Name: EXER
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that are exercised.

Code.Name: FRCL
Code.Description: Delivery will be made free of payment but a clean payment order will be sent.

Code.Name: KNOC
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that are expired worthless.

Code.Name: NPAR
Code.Description: Partial settlement is not allowed.

Code.Name: NSSP
Code.Description: Standing settlement parties have to be overridden.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Partial settlement is allowed.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Securities are to be physically settled.

Code.Name: RESI
Code.Description: Relates to transaction on a security that is not eligible at the Central Securities Depository (CSD) but for which the payment will be enacted by the CSD.

Code.Name: SHOR
Code.Description: Settlement transaction will create a short position.

Code.Name: SPDL
Code.Description: Settlement transactions to be settled with special delivery.

Code.Name: SPST
Code.Description: Money and financial instrument settle in different locations.

Code.Name: UNEX
Code.Description: Delivery cannot be performed until money is received.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is TRCA and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Settlement party is a custodian. It receives/delivers the securities and carries out custodial duties.

Code.Name: SAGE
Code.Description: Party that settles trades on behalf of his client for which he also traded.

Code.Name: SPRI
Code.Description: Party that settles its own trades.

Option.Name: S
Option.Specification: (Qualifier) (Data Source Scheme) (Type of ID) (Country Code) (Alternate ID)

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73) .

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .
In option S, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Type of ID must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K95) :

Code.Name: ARNU
Code.Description: Number assigned by a government agency to identify foreign nationals.

Code.Name: CCPT
Code.Description: Number assigned by a passport authority.

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Number assigned to a corporate entity.

Code.Name: DRLC
Code.Description: Number assigned to a driver's license.

Code.Name: TXID
Code.Description: Number assigned by a tax authority to an entity.

Validation.Comment: Alternate ID (Format Option S) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).
If Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain the following code (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NSSP
Code.Description: Standing settlement parties have to be overridden.

Option.Name: S
Option.Specification: (Qualifier) (Data Source Scheme) (Type of ID) (Country Code) (Alternate ID)

Validation.Comment: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73) .
In option S, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Type of ID must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K95) :

Code.Name: ARNU
Code.Description: Number assigned by a government agency to identify foreign nationals.

Code.Name: CCPT
Code.Description: Number assigned by a passport authority.

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Number assigned to a corporate entity.

Code.Name: DRLC
Code.Description: Number assigned to a driver's license.

Code.Name: TXID
Code.Description: Number assigned by a tax authority to an entity.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

If Qualifier is ACCW ,INTM or PAYE, the BIC must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information about BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations . (Error code(s): C05) .

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Alternate ID (Format Option S) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

fieldvalidation.name: U08
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid syntax, format, code word in tag 119(Validation Flag),or field tag 119 is missing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 In sequence A, if field :20C::SCTR is not present, then field :20C::RCTR is mandatory, otherwise field :20C::RCTR is optional (Error code(s): E68).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field :20C::SCTR is not present, then field :20C::RCTR is mandatory, otherwise field :20C::RCTR is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 The presence of sequence B depends on the value of field :25D::4!c//<Status> in sequence A and the value of field :13A::LINK//<Number Id> in subsequence A2 (Error code(s): D29).
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value.REST.$size > 0 && IsNull(A.F25D.REST.Data_Source_Scheme), If((FieldValueExistsInAtLeastOne(A, "F25D.REST.Status_Code", "ACCP") && FieldValueExistsInAtLeastOne(A.A2, "F13a.LINK.Number_Id", "504")) || (FieldValueExistsInAtLeastOne(A, "F25D.REST.Status_Code", "ACCT") && FieldValueExistsInAtLeastOne(A.A2, "F13a.LINK.Number_Id", "504")), B.$size > 0, If(FieldValueExistsInAtLeastOne(A, "F25D.REST.Status_Code", "REJT"), B.$size == 0, true)), If($value.REST.$size == 0, B.$size == 0, true))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence B depends on the value of field :25D::4!c//Status in sequence A and the value of field :13A::LINK//Number Id in subsequence A2."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 In each occurrence of sequence B, the presence of subsequence B1 depends on the value of field :25D::COLL//<Status> and :22H::COLL//<Indicator> (Error code(s): C70).
fieldvalidation.formula: If(IsNull(B.F25D.COLL.Data_Source_Scheme), If(FieldValueExistsInAtLeastOne(B.F25D, "COLL.Status_Code", "ACCT") && (FieldValueExistsInAtLeastOne(B.F22H, "COLL.Indicator", "CCOL") || FieldValueExistsInAtLeastOne(B.F22H, "COLL.Indicator", "SCOL")), B.B1.$size > 0, B.B1.$size == 0), If(FieldValueExistsInAtLeastOne(B.F22H, "COLL.Indicator", "BCOL"), B.B1.$size == 0, true))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, the presence of subsequence B1 depends on the value of field :25D::COLL//Status and :22H::COLL//Indicator."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A1
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::BUYR for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A2
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::DEAG for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A3
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::DECU for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::DEI1 for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A5
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::DEI2 for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A6
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::PSET for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A7
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::REAG for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A8
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::RECU for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A9
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::REI1 for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A10
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::REI2 for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A11
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::SELL for subsequence B1a1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A12
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of sequence B, for subsequences B1a1 and B1b1, the following party fields cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The party field :95a::ACCW for subsequence B1b1 cannot appear more than once in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A13

fieldvalidation.name: C9
fieldvalidation.comment: C9 In each occurrence of subsequence A1, if field :22F::AGRE is not present, then field :70C::AGRE is mandatory, otherwise field :70C::AGRE is optional (Error code(s): E71).

fieldvalidation.name: C10
fieldvalidation.comment: C10 The user header of the message (block 3) is mandatory and must contain a valid code in the Validation Flag field 119 ( {3:{119:xxxx}} ). This code must be identical to the code contained in field :22a::COLA//xxxx (Exposure Type Indicator) in sequence A of the message content (text block 4) (Error code(s): C94).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The user header of the message (block 3) is mandatory and must contain a valid code in the Validation Flag field 119 ( {3:{119:xxxx}} ). This code must be identical to the code contained in field :22a::COLA//xxxx (Exposure Type Indicator) in sequence A of the message content (text block 4)."

fieldvalidation.name: C11
fieldvalidation.comment: C11 In each occurrence of sequence B (if present), if subsequence B1 is present, the presence of subsequences B1a and B1b depends on the value of field :22H::COLL//<Indicator> in sequence B (Error code(s): C69).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B (if present), if subsequence B1 is present, the presence of subsequences B1a and B1b depends on the value of field :22H::COLL//Indicator in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C12
fieldvalidation.comment: C12 Field :13a::LINK must be present in one and only one occurrence of subsequence A2 (Error code(s): D52).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field :13a::LINK must be present in one and only one occurrence of subsequence A2."

fieldvalidation.name: C13
fieldvalidation.comment: C13 Field:20C::RELA must be present in the same occurrence of subsequence A2 where field :13a::LINK is present (Error code(s): D53).
